text: ( Source : Dubai Electricity and Water Authority ) Mon, 05 Oct 2015 Dubai Electricity and Water Authority (DEWA) has appointed Hadeed Emirates Contracting Company as Contractor for the construction of the Solar Innovation Centre at the
